p: In total, we found 71 modeling studies that investigated the future effects of climate change on IAS distributions. The number of these studies has increased over the last 10 years (Figure 1a). Most studies rely on species distribution models only (using MaxEnt or ensemble modeling through the BioMod platform, n = 43) or species distribution models combined with key processes like Climex, n = 16 (see Box 1 for modeling specificities).
